update problem set
title = #{title},
difficulty = #{difficulty},
question_type = #{question_type},
ispublic = #{ispublic},
problem_stem = #{problem_stem},
in_format = #{in_format},
out_format = #{out_format},
in_example = #{in_example},
out_example = #{out_example},
notice = #{notice},
submit_times = #{submit_times},
submit_pass_times = #{submit_pass_times},
submit_number = #{submit_number},
submit_pass_number = #{submit_pass_number},
solution = #{solution},
point = #{point},
good = #{good},
bad = #{bad},
latest_submit = now(),
modify_by = #{modify_by},
modify_time=now() where id=#{id}

update problem set good=(select count(1) from problem_good_record where problem_id = #{problem_id} and number > 0), bad=(select count(1) from problem_good_record where problem_id = #{problem_id} and number < 0), modify_time=now() where id = #{problem_id}
